value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily
value.excerpt: In today's video I am collaborating with Imke Feldmann to bring you the best that M or Power Query has to offer.  We will show you how you can easily re-use M functions in your reports.  Link to the sources: http://www.thebiccountant.com/2017/12/11/date-datesbetween-retrieve-dates-between-2-dates-power-bi-power-query/

value.title: Review Power Query with Query Diagnostics tool - Power BI Desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: Powerweek is back!!! and in today's video I will review the Power BI desktop update feature released in october 2019 called Query diagnostics. I will tell you what I like about it and what needs to be improved imo.  Link to MS documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-query/querydiagnostics

value.title: Set up Query Parameters to avoid hardcoded paths
value.excerpt: With the release of the April update (2016), Power Bi allows the use of parameters and in this video I will show you how to configure them to avoid using hardcoded paths when connecting to file sources in your computer.  Link to the previous video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JER0QXmL34k   Looking

value.title: Trim/ remove spaces in a text column Power Query - Power BI Tips & Tricks #29
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to trim or remove spaces (whitespaces) in Power Query / Power BI  Link to Ken Puls blog if you want to copy the function: http://www.excelguru.ca/blog/2015/10/08/clean-whitespace-in-powerquery/   Looking for a download file? value.title: Troubleshoot missing applied filters in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you ever seen that a visual is being filtered and you can't find where that filter is? Whether it has happened to you yet or not, make sure you check this video so you know how to fix it when if happens. #curbal #powerbi  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Two ways to write natural language narratives in your Power BI reports
value.excerpt: We show you here two ways to build natural language into your Power BI reports: 1. Using Narrative science custom visual: https://powerbi.narrativescience.com/welcome  2. Create the natural language using measures  If you want to use Narrative Science service for Google Analytics, here is the link: https://www.narrativescience.com/quill-engage

value.title: Why data profiling is useful in Power BI - Power Bi desktop update October 2019

value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going to write a function that calculates work hour (seconds) between two datetimes. Working hour by location, holidays will also be included :)  Link to Bills thread: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/f3fc729e-a2ec-409a-b20e-b5cf8ff5dc2a/calculate-work-hours-between-two-timedate-stamps?forum=powerquery

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth
value.excerpt: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth  In this video, I show you how to configure Active Directory Federated Services (ADFS) and the Web Application Proxy (WAP) role, in Windows 2016, so that you can connect from Power BI mobile to SQL Server Reporting Services using OAuth.  The ADFS and WAP
